commands.name: /console random
commands.description: Shows a random game console with release year, short intro, image (if available), and sources.

games firsts.description: First and early commercially released games (curated).

commands.name: /games first100
commands.description: Lists up to the first 100 commercially released games from the curated registry (expandable).

commands.name: /games by_year
commands.description: Shows early commercially released games by year, or lists a specific year when provided.
